title: מה זה השטויות האלה?
overview: Each episode of מה זה השטויות האלה? deals with a particular issue in human society in general and Israeli in particular. Adi Ashkenazi, who gives the program a humorous aspect, goes through certain situations that are included in the general subject, and investigates experts, professionals and members of the entertainment world, together with a stand-up comedy about the subject.
